name: MyBurger
description:
Responsive burger restaurant React web app, built for managing hamburger ingredients & orders.
Register/Login
Easily build your burger ingredients
 Fill your address for delivery
Order!
Check your orders history 
 Built with: ReactJS, Redux, NodeJS, Express, JWT & MongoDB

name: Sentimental Analysis Web Tool
description:
Sentimental Analysis Web Tool helping us to collect some interesting statistics, opinion and opinion polarities from recent global tweets by simple query search. 
Built with: NodeJS, Express & Twitter API.

name: MyAppartment
description:
MyAppartment is a roommates Android app helping us to manage bills & expenses properly.
1. Register and create your "room" and become your apartment manager
2. I room is existing, register and join existing room
3. Get expenses info about yout roomates

name: Evil twin attack
description:
Evil Twin Attack tool built during cyber security course, it is Python & Bash app for phishing gmail accounts by deAuth victims WIFI AP and keep it disconnected by sending packets spamming, creating new WIFI AP with similar victims AP name.
When the victim connects to fake AP he will get only html & css fake gmail page by hosting Apache server.
Any http request will redirect to fake gmail form and the victim will try connect to his gmail account.

name: Camping forum
description: Web app forum for camping lovers, supplies register, login, rating platform for camp posts create new post, comment & remove posts/comments.
